verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Do not inflame yourself with evildoers; and do not be envious against workers of perversity;
for they soon wither like grass and fade like the green herb.
Trust in Jehovah and do good; live in the land and feed on faithfulness.
And delight yourself in Jehovah, that He may give you your heart's desire.
Roll your way on Jehovah and trust in Him; and He will work.
And He will bring forth your righteousness like the light; and your judgment like the noon day.
Rest in Jehovah and wait patiently for Him; inflame not yourself with him who prospers in his way, with the man practicing wicked wiles.
Abstain from anger and cease from fury; also do not inflame yourself to do evil.
For evildoers shall be cut off; and the ones waiting on Jehovah, they shall inherit the earth.
It is but a little and the wicked one shall not be; yea, you shall consider his place, and he is not.
But the meek shall inherit the earth; yea, they shall delight themselves in abundant peace.
The wicked one plots against the righteous one and gnashes on him with his teeth;
the Lord laughs at him, for He sees that his day is coming.
The wicked ones have drawn out the sword and cause the afflicted and needy ones to fall, to slaughter the upright of way.
Their sword shall enter into their heart, and their bows shall be broken.
A little to the righteous one is better than the abundance of many wicked ones.
For the arms of wicked ones shall be broken; but Jehovah upholds righteous ones.
Jehovah knows the days of the blameless one; yea, their inheritance shall be forever.
They shall not be ashamed in an evil time; and they shall be satisfied in days of famine.
But the wicked ones shall perish; yea, the enemies of Jehovah shall be like the beauty of pastures; they are consumed; like smoke, they vanish.
The wicked one borrows and never repays, but the righteous one is gracious and giving.
For His blessed ones inherit the earth; and those cursed by Him shall be cut off.
The steps of a man are established from Jehovah; and He will delight in his way.
Though he falls, he is not cast down; for Jehovah holds up his hand.
I have been young and am old, yet I have not seen the righteous one forsaken, or his seed begging bread.
All the day he is gracious and lends; and his seed is for a blessing.
Turn away from evil and do good and live forever.
For Jehovah loves judgment and does not forsake His godly ones; they are preserved forever; but the seed of the wicked ones shall be cut off.
The righteous ones shall inherit the earth and live on it forever.
The mouth of the righteous one utters wisdom, and his tongue speaks judgment.
The Law of his God is in his heart; his steps do not slide.
The wicked one spies on the righteous one and seeks to kill him.
Jehovah does not leave him in his hand, and does not find him guilty in his judgment.
Wait on Jehovah and keep His way; and He shall exalt you in the cutting off of the wicked ones.
I have seen the wicked one, the ruthless one, even spreading himself out like a luxuriant, native tree;
yet he passed away, and, behold, he was not; and I looked for him, but he could not be found.
Watch the perfect one and behold the upright one; for the end of that man is peace.
But the transgressors are destroyed together; the end of the wicked ones is cut off.
But the salvation of the righteous ones is from Jehovah; He is their strength in the time of distress.
And Jehovah helps them and slipping away He makes them slip away from the wicked ones and save them, because they trust in Him.
